page.title: 01TRANSPORT RECREATION SPORT
page.content: NARBERTH HAS MOST OF THE BASIC AMENITIES,BUS AND TRAIN SERVICES ARE AVAILABLE FOR LOCAL AND LONG DISTANCE JOURNEYS.THERE ARE FACILITIES FOR SWIMMING,CRICKET,FOOTBALL,RUGBY AND COURT GAMES.THERE ARE THREE MAJOR BANKS TWO BUILDING SOCIETYS THERE ARE THREE ESTATE AGENTS A POST OFFICE AND A LIBRARY.MEDICAL AND DENTAL FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE AT THE HEALTH CENTRE.SCHOOLING IS AVAILABLE FOR ALL AGES OF CHILDREN,WITH A GRAMMER SCHOOL AND COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS AVAILABLE. WHEN WE DID A SURVEY WE FOUND THAT 62% OF THE POPULATION LIKE LIVING IN THIS AREA,19% DID NOT,THE REMAINDER WERE TOURISTS.WE THINK PEOPLE LIKE LIVING HERE BECAUSE WE HAVE GOOD AMENITIES.
